sentences.english: Qiaojia County, situated by the Jinsha River, is a typical mountain region in northeastern Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 巧家縣是雲南省東北部金沙江畔的一個典型山區縣。

sentences.english: Before modern history , Yangshupu was in the wild Huangpu river alone.
sentences.chinese: 近代以前，楊樹浦是僻處黃浦江畔的荒郊地帶。

sentences.english: Shanghai stands on the Huangpu River.
Until 1896, Harbin was a fishing village on the banks of the Songhua River.
sentences.chinese: 直到1896年，哈爾濱只是一個松花江畔的漁村。

sentences.english: The most attractive work of architecture is no other than the Oriental Pearl Tower standing by the bank of the Huangpu River.
sentences.chinese: 最引人入勝的建築物當屬位於黃浦江畔的東方明珠塔。

sentences.english: She spent her happy childhood on the riverside of Batang Rajang.
sentences.chinese: 在拉讓江畔盧巖坡渡過快樂的童年。

sentences.english: Those sentiments are felt on Dandong's waterfront as well as in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 不止在北京，在丹東的江畔這種看法也感受得到。

sentences.english: Jianshan Oiantang River, tidal state, the birthplace.
sentences.chinese: 尖山，錢江畔，潮邦的誕生地。

sentences.english: In the park the northwest corner of the floor, overlooking the Huangpu River scenery.
sentences.chinese: 而在園區西北角的樓層上，可遠眺黃浦江畔的風光。

definition: Linjiang county level city in Baishan 白山, Jilin
